title: Thank you Riot for the lag
body: I just had amazing lag in ranked game (check my net and pc the problem is from riot) thank you alot you fcking %%%%s I just lost a ranked game because of your fcking shitty server fix your fcking servers you fcking %%%%s it just cost me a game I lost a free won game because of you all I could see is pictures thanks to you I lost the game FIX YOUR FCKING SERVERS!!!

replies.body: Hey it sounds like you went through a shitty experience, sorry.  :(  I'm not seeing anything out of the ordinary with our game server, but there could be something else going on.  When you get a chance, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for that match so we can take a better look and see what happened.  Let me know what you find.
it seems fine now but the thing I was mad about the most was that I could prolly won the game easy if I didn't had lag I had good kda with lag :(
